text: Last Exit to Brooklyn is a 1989 English-language British-German drama movie, directed by Uli Edel, and based on the novel by Hubert Selby Jr. ==Plot== In the 1950s in Brooklyn, a group of prostitutes, unionist activists and drag queens lead difficult lives, an existence of drugs, crime and violence in a working class Brooklyn neighborhood. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 drama movies Category:1980s LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:British drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Brooklyn Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Transgender in movies Category:Movies directed by Uli Edel
title: Last Exit to Brooklyn (movie)
